<h3> Introduction </h3>
<p> Hi! I’m Robbie, a data professional with a [Master’s in Statistics](education/index.html) from NC State University, where I completed PhD-level core coursework in statistical methods and theory. [With almost 5 years of relevant experience](work/index.html) in data science, research, and statistician-based work, I specialize in delivering insights that empower data-driven strategies. I am proficient in R, SAS, JMP, CSS/HTML, Python, and more. This website is intended to present [snippets of my work](projects/index.html), as well as more information about [who I am](hobbies/index.html). 
</p>
